summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating the Alley in Block 2, Ross 2nd Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by West Emerson Street, 6th Avenue West, West Nickerson Street, 3rd Avenue West, and West Bertona Street, and the Alley between Block 55 and Block 56, Denny and Hoyt's Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by West Cremona Street, 3rd Avenue West, West Bertona Street, West Nickerson Street and Queen Anne Avenue North, on the petition of Seattle Pacific University; accepting deeds to real property for park and recreation purposes, and general municipal purposes; and accepting a hold harmless agreement (Clerk File No. 298688).
